changeSet.author: synchro
changeSet.sql: CREATE COLUMN TABLE "${synchro.schema}"."/SYN/DIEF_PI_REGISTRO_TIPO_53"( "MANDT" NVARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, "EMPRESA" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "FILIAL" NVARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, "DT_INI" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, "DT_FIN" NVARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, "CNPJ_CPF" NVARCHAR(14), "IE" NVARCHAR(14), "DT_E_S" NVARCHAR(8), "UF" NVARCHAR(2), "COD_MOD" NVARCHAR(2), "SER" NVARCHAR(4), "NUM_DOC" NVARCHAR(6), "CFOP" NVARCHAR(4), "IND_EMIT" NVARCHAR(1), "VL_BC_ICMSST" DECIMAL(25,6), "VL_ICMSST" DECIMAL(25,6), "VL_OUT_DA" DECIMAL(25,2), "COD_SIT" NVARCHAR(1)) UNLOAD PRIORITY 5 AUTO MERGE
